metadata.name: Charged Keys
metadata.description:
Fixes pocket actives and pocket consumables sharing the same button.
I love this game to death, but it's got a god-awful input scheme. With this mod, if you press Shift you'll use your pocket active, and if you press Q you won't. You can remap this key via [URL=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Mod Config Menu[/URL].
Note for T.Cain: Finish crafting by pressing Shift while holding Q. [URL=https://github.com/pie-flavor/chargedkeys]Source[/URL]
